Text: Requests for Weather Information outside Global Markets Cc Vince Following our conversation earlier today here is a list of projects and services together with main contacts requested from UK Gas UK and Continental Power I am currently providing a limited daily morning weather briefing to UK Gas which they appear to greatly appreciate Have a good weekend Tony Wind Power Project Dan Badger EELEnron Wind Source long term historical wind station data going back to or so which is complete at an hourly timescale and in close proximity to a number of wind farm locations throughout Europe given by their longitudes and latitudes Identify vendors prices and timescales and ultimately obtain this data Once we have the data work with Ross McIntyre Weather Derivatives to build hourly HiLo frequency distributions and yearly averages with a view to correlating windspeeds with Power Output and building a trading model for Wind Power Spanish Power Project Kristian Lande EELCont Pwr trPool Based Trad Identify sources of temperature precipitation and windspeed historical and forecast data for Spanish Cities Welsh Power Project Tim PoullianPatterson EEL Structuring Identify sources of temperature precipitation and windspeed data for a number of sites in Wales UK Gas Project Peter Crilly EELUK Management Provide input on refining current gas demand model for UK UK Gas Service Peter Crilly EELUK Mangement Give daily briefing at am on to day UK weather outlook focused on UK temperatures Provide electronic version of to day map for inclusion in intranet site Provide to day European temperature forecast and dicussion in electronic format for inclusion in daily newsletter by am Provide update briefing at noon following inclusion of all forecast models on any changes to to day outlook Provide briefing at noon on to day Uk weather outlook focused on temperature Spanish Power Service Kristian Lande EELCont Pwr trPool Based Trad Give daily briefing around noon on Spanish hydro outlook focused on precip forecasts for Spain and Switzerland Dutch Power Service Jonathan Pietila EELCont Pwr TrPool Based Trad Give daily breifing around am on Dutch weather outlook focused on temperatures over The Netherlands Belgium Denmark and northern Germany
